text: 20:18 Matyu 16:21; 17:22-23“Ia oragh, E nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn ghuavanadi. Eghtɨ gumazitam Gumazamizibar Otarim isɨva, Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba koma ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar anɨngam. Eghtɨ me a isɨ kotiam datɨghɨva, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva me akabar kɨram, egh me kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, Nɨ aremegham.
